name: TRASH Collector (Supertoady)
description:
Are you ready to collect trash? Or are you a Trash Collector? Well, find out by playing this game!


How to play:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Space to drop items

Walk into a bin to put items into bin

Put cardboard/paper into the green bin

Put glass into the blue bin

Put general waste into the red bin

Credits:

I used this color pallete

This character for inspiration
